description.value: Information about a medication that is used to support knowledge.

short.value: Definition of Medication

definition.value: Information about a medication.

short.value: Business identifier for this medication

definition.value: Business identifier for this medication.

comment.value: This is a business identifier, not a resource identifier (see discussion).

short.value: Code that identifies this medication

definition.value: A code that specifies this medication, or a textual description if no code is available. Usage note: This could be a standard medication code such as a code from RxNorm, SNOMED CT, IDMP etc. It could also be a national or local formulary code, optionally with translations to other code systems.

comment.value: Depending on the context of use, the code that was actually selected by the user (prescriber, dispenser, etc.) will have the coding.userSelected set to true. As described in the coding datatype: "A coding may be marked as a "userSelected" if a user selected the particular coded value in a user interface (e.g. the user selects an item in a pick-list). If a user selected coding exists, it is the preferred choice for performing translations etc. Other codes can only be literal translations to alternative code systems, or codes at a lower level of granularity (e.g. a generic code for a vendor-specific primary one).

valueString.value: A coded concept that defines the type of a medication.

short.value: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized

definition.value: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized.

short.value: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses

definition.value: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses.

short.value: A business level identifier of the product version

definition.value: A business level identifier of the product version.

short.value: inactive | entered-in-error | active | draft

definition.value: A code to indicate if the medication is in active use. The status refers to the validity about the information of the medication and not to its medicinal properties.

comment.value: This status is intended to identify if the medication in a local system is in active use within a drug database or inventory. For example, a pharmacy system may create a new drug file record for a compounded product "ABC Hospital Special Cream" with an active status. At some point in the future, it may be determined that the drug record was created with an error and the status is changed to "entered in error". This status is not intended to specify if a medication is part of a particular formulary. It is possible that the drug record may be referenced by multiple formularies or catalogues and each of those entries would have a separate status.

isModifierReason.value: This element changes the interpretation of all descriptive attributes.

valueString.value: A coded concept defining if the medication is in active use.

short.value: The date at which the given status became applicable

definition.value: The date at which the given status became applicable.

short.value: General description of this product

definition.value: General description of this product.

short.value: The legal status of supply of the packaged item as classified by the regulator

definition.value: The legal status of supply of the packaged item as classified by the regulator.

short.value: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product

definition.value: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product.

short.value: The administrable dose form, after necessary reconstitution

definition.value: The administrable dose form, after necessary reconstitution.

short.value: Dose form as manufactured and before any transformation into the pharmaceutical product

definition.value: Dose form as manufactured and before any transformation into the pharmaceutical product.

short.value: General combined description of indication(s) for this product, for use when a structured set is not available. See also the ClinicalUseIssue resource, which can be used for more structured indications, and can be made to reference to this resource

definition.value: General combined description of indication(s) for this product, for use when a structured set is not available. See also the ClinicalUseIssue resource, which can be used for more structured indications, and can be made to reference to this resource.

short.value: If authorised for use in children

definition.value: If authorised for use in children.

short.value: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons

definition.value: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons.

short.value: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons

definition.value: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons.

short.value: Allows the product to be classified by various systems

definition.value: Allows the product to be classified by various systems.

short.value: Characteristics e.g. a products onset of action

definition.value: Characteristics e.g. a products onset of action.

short.value: A code expressing the type of characteristic

definition.value: A code expressing the type of characteristic.

short.value: A value for the characteristic

definition.value: A value for the characteristic.

short.value: The status of characteristic e.g. assigned or pending

definition.value: The status of characteristic e.g. assigned or pending.

short.value: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorization

definition.value: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorization.

short.value: The ingredients that make up this manufactured item

definition.value: The ingredients that make up this manufactured item.

short.value: The role of the ingredient in the product

definition.value: The role of the ingredient in the product.

short.value: The actual ingredient

definition.value: The actual ingredient that constitutes the product.

short.value: The type of ingredient in the product

definition.value: The type of ingredient in the product.

short.value: The substance or product defined as ingredient

definition.value: The substance or product defined as ingredient.

short.value: The strength of the substance

definition.value: The strength of the substance.

short.value: The type of strength (reference strength, etc)

definition.value: The type of strength (reference strength, etc).

short.value: The value of the strength

definition.value: The value of the strength.

short.value: The textual expression of the strength

definition.value: The textual expression of the strength.

short.value: The textual expression of the strength

definition.value: The textual expression of the strength.

short.value: For API

definition.value: For API.

short.value: For biologics

definition.value: For biologics.

short.value: Content ratio

definition.value: Content ratio.

short.value: Content ratio

definition.value: Content ratio.

short.value: Component quantity per batch

definition.value: Component quantity per batch.

short.value: Numeric strength

definition.value: Numeric strength.

short.value: Additional information

definition.value: Additional information.

short.value: Any component of the drug product which is not the chemical entity defined as the drug substance or an excipient in the drug product. This includes process-related impurities and contaminants, product-related impurities including degradation products

definition.value: Any component of the drug product which is not the chemical entity defined as the drug substance or an excipient in the drug product. This includes process-related impurities and contaminants, product-related impurities including degradation products.

short.value: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission

definition.value: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission.

short.value: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File)

definition.value: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File).

short.value: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization

definition.value: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization.

short.value: Allows the contact to be classified, for example QPPV, Pharmacovigilance Enquiry Information

definition.value: Allows the contact to be classified, for example QPPV, Pharmacovigilance Enquiry Information.

short.value: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization

definition.value: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization.

short.value: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts

definition.value: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts.

short.value: The full product name

definition.value: The full product name.

short.value: Type of product name, such as rINN, BAN, Proprietary, Non-Proprietary

definition.value: Type of product name, such as rINN, BAN, Proprietary, Non-Proprietary.

short.value: Coding words or phrases of the name

definition.value: Coding words or phrases of the name.

short.value: A fragment of a product name

definition.value: A fragment of a product name.

short.value: Identifying type for this part of the name (e.g. strength part)

definition.value: Identifying type for this part of the name (e.g. strength part).

short.value: Country where the name applies

definition.value: Country where the name applies.

short.value: Country code for where this name applies

definition.value: Country code for where this name applies.

short.value: Jurisdiction code for where this name applies

definition.value: Jurisdiction code for where this name applies.

short.value: Language code for this name

definition.value: Language code for this name.

short.value: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product

definition.value: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

short.value: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product

definition.value: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

short.value: The type of relationship, for instance branded to generic, product to development product (investigational), parallel import version

definition.value: The type of relationship, for instance branded to generic, product to development product (investigational), parallel import version.

short.value: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product

definition.value: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

short.value: The product that this is a pharmaceutical product of

definition.value: The product that this is a pharmaceutical product of.

short.value: The manufactured item(s) that this administrable product is produced from. Either a single item, or several that are mixed before administration (e.g. a power item and a solution item). Note that these are not raw ingredients

definition.value: The manufactured item(s) that this administrable product is produced from. Either a single item, or several that are mixed before administration (e.g. a power item and a solution item). Note that these are not raw ingredients.

short.value: Manufacturer of the item (Note that this should be named 'manufacturer' but it currently causes technical issues)

definition.value: Manufacturer of the item (Note that this should be named 'manufacturer' but it currently causes technical issues).

short.value: An authorization for this package type

definition.value: An authorization for this package type.

short.value: An operation applied to the product, for manufacturing or administrative purpose

definition.value: An operation applied to the product, for manufacturing or administrative purpose.

short.value: The type of manufacturing operation e.g. manufacturing itself, re-packaging. This may be a subtype of some other wider scope of authorized operation, referenced by the authorization attribute

definition.value: The type of manufacturing operation e.g. manufacturing itself, re-packaging. This may be a subtype of some other wider scope of authorized operation, referenced by the authorization attribute.

short.value: Date range of applicability

definition.value: Date range of applicability.

short.value: The manufacturer or establishment associated with the process

definition.value: The manufacturer or establishment associated with the process.

short.value: An authorization for this process, either as a logical reference, holding just an identifier, or a full reference to a resource that captures the details. The authorization may possibly apply to several products or a wider scope of process of which this is a part

definition.value: An authorization for this process, either as a logical reference, holding just an identifier, or a full reference to a resource that captures the details. The authorization may possibly apply to several products or a wider scope of process of which this is a part.

short.value: To indicate if this process is commercially confidential

definition.value: To indicate if this process is commercially confidential.

short.value: A device that is integral to the medication item, in effect being considered as an 'ingredient' of the pharmaceutical product. This is not intended for devices that are just co-packaged

definition.value: A device that is integral to the medication item, in effect being considered as an 'ingredient' of the pharmaceutical product. This is not intended for devices that are just co-packaged.

short.value: States whether a drug product is supplied with another item such as a diluent or adjuvant

definition.value: States whether a drug product is supplied with another item such as a diluent or adjuvant.

short.value: Package representation for the product

definition.value: Package representation for the product.

short.value: Textual description. Note that this is not the name of the package or product

definition.value: Textual description. Note that this is not the name of the package or product.

short.value: A descriptive type for this package, such as box, carton or bottle

definition.value: A descriptive type for this package, such as box, carton or bottle.

short.value: The kind of closures used for the container in which the drug substances and finished dosage forms are stored.

definition.value: The kind of closures used for the container in which the drug substances and finished dosage forms are stored. .

short.value: The amount of items, or of substance, in the package

definition.value: The amount of items, or of substance, in the package.

short.value: The path by which the pharmaceutical product is taken into or makes contact with the body

definition.value: The path by which the pharmaceutical product is taken into or makes contact with the body.

short.value: Coded expression for the route

definition.value: Coded expression for the route.

short.value: The maximum single dose that can be administered as per the protocol of a clinical trial can be specified using a numerical value and its unit of measurement

definition.value: The maximum single dose that can be administered as per the protocol of a clinical trial can be specified using a numerical value and its unit of measurement.

short.value: A species for which this route applies

definition.value: A species for which this route applies.

short.value: A species specific time during which consumption of animal product is not appropriate

definition.value: A species specific time during which consumption of animal product is not appropriate.

short.value: Coded expression for the type of tissue for which the withdrawal period applues, e.g. meat, milk

definition.value: Coded expression for the type of tissue for which the withdrawal period applues, e.g. meat, milk.

short.value: A value for the time

definition.value: A value for the time.

short.value: Extra information about the withdrawal period

definition.value: Extra information about the withdrawal period.
